verses.verse: In the <S%G746>beginning<s%> was the <S%G3056>Word,<s%> and the <S%G3056>Word<s%> was with <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3056>Word<s%> was <S%G2316>God.<s%>
The <S%G3778>same<s%> was in the <S%G746>beginning<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> things were <S%G1096>made<s%> by him; and <S%G5565>without<s%> him was not <S%G1520>any<s%> thing <S%G1096>made<s%> that was <S%G1096>made.<s%>
In him was <S%G2222>life;<s%> and the <S%G2222>life<s%> was the <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
And the <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G5316>shines<s%> in <S%G4653>darkness;<s%> and the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> <S%G2638>comprehended<s%> it not.
There was a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G2491>John.<s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> for a <S%G3141>witness,<s%> to <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of the <S%G5457>Light,<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1223>through<s%> him might <S%G4100>believe.<s%>
He was not that <S%G5457>Light,<s%> but was sent to <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of that <S%G5457>Light.<s%>
That was the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G5457>Light,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5461>lights<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
He was in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and the <S%G2889>world<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> by him, and the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> him not.
He <S%G2064>came<s%> to his own, and his own <S%G3880>received<s%> him not.

But as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2983>received<s%> him, to them <S%G1325>gave<s%> he <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> even to them that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> his <S%G3686>name:<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> were <S%G1080>born,<s%> not of <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G435>man,<s%> but of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G3056>Word<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and <S%G4637>dwelled<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> us, (and we <S%G2300>beheld<s%> his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> as of the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%>) <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of him, and <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> was he of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2036>spoke,<s%> He that <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me is <S%G1715>preferred<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> me: for he was <S%G4413>before<s%> me.
And of his <S%G4138>fullness<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> we <S%G2983>received,<s%> and <S%G5485>grace<s%> for <S%G5485>grace.<s%>
For the <S%G3551>law<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> by <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> but <S%G5485>grace<s%> and <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> has <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4455>at<s%> <S%G4455>any<s%> <S%G4455>time,<s%> the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in the <S%G2859>bosom<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> he has <S%G1834>declared<s%> him.

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G3141>record<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> and <S%G3019>Levites<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> him, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you?
And he <S%G3670>confessed,<s%> and <S%G720>denied<s%> not; but <S%G3670>confessed,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And they <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> <S%G1488>Are<s%> you <S%G2243>Elias?<s%> And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not. <S%G1488>Are<s%> you that <S%G4396>prophet?<s%> And he <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3756>No.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they to him, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you? that we may <S%G1325>give<s%> an <S%G612>answer<s%> to them that <S%G3992>sent<s%> us. <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you of <S%G4572>yourself?<s%>

He <S%G5346>said,<s%> I am the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2116>Make<s%> <S%G2116>straight<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> as <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias.<s%>
And they <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G649>sent<s%> were of the <S%G5330>Pharisees.<s%>

And they <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> you <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you be not that <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2243>Elias,<s%> neither that <S%G4396>prophet?<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G907>baptize<s%> with <S%G5204>water:<s%> but there <S%G2476>stands<s%> one <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5216><s%> you, <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> not;

He it is, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me is <S%G1096>preferred<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> me, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoe's<s%> <S%G2438>lace<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>unloose.<s%>
<S%G5023>These<s%> things were <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G962>Bethabara<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G907>baptizing.<s%>

The <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G991>sees<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2396>Behold<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G142>takes<s%> away the <S%G266>sin<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is he of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3694>After<s%> me <S%G2064>comes<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G1096>preferred<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> me: for he was <S%G4413>before<s%> me.

And I <S%G1492>knew<s%> him not: but that he should be <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> am I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> with <S%G5204>water.<s%>

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>record,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G2300>saw<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove,<s%> and it <S%G3306>stayed<s%> on him.

And I <S%G1492>knew<s%> him not: but he that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me to <S%G907>baptize<s%> with <S%G5204>water,<s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, On <S%G3739>whom<s%> you shall <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending,<s%> and <S%G3306>remaining<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him, the <S%G3778>same<s%> is he which <S%G907>baptizes<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
And I <S%G3708>saw,<s%> and <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>record<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3825>Again<s%> the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G1887>after<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples;<s%>
And <S%G1689>looking<s%> on <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> as he <S%G4043>walked,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2396>Behold<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>
And the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> him <S%G2980>speak,<s%> and they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G2300>saw<s%> them <S%G190>following,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> you? They <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4461>Rabbi,<s%> <S%G3739>(which<s%> is to <S%G3004>say,<s%> being <S%G2059>interpreted,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%>) <S%G4226>where<s%> <S%G3306>dwell<s%> you?

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2064>Come<s%> and see. <S%G1492><s%> They <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he <S%G3306>dwelled,<s%> and <S%G3306>stayed<s%> with him that <S%G2250>day:<s%> for it was <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1182>tenth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G1520>One<s%> of the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> speak, and <S%G190>followed<s%> him, was <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter's<s%> <S%G80>brother.<s%>

He <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2147>finds<s%> his own <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, We have <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G3323>Messias,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is, being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And he <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>beheld<s%> him, he <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2495>Jona:<s%> you shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> Cephas, <S%G2786><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is by <S%G2059>interpretation,<s%> A <S%G4074>stone.<s%>

The <S%G1887>day<s%> <S%G1887>following<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G2147>finds<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>Follow<s%> me.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> was of <S%G966>Bethsaida,<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G406>Andrew<s%> and <S%G4074>Peter.<s%>

<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2147>finds<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, We have <S%G2147>found<s%> him, of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> in the <S%G3551>law,<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> did <S%G1125>write,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>

And <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1410>Can<s%> there <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> thing <S%G1511>come<s%> out of <S%G3478>Nazareth?<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2064>Come<s%> and <S%G1492>see.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> of him, <S%G2396>Behold<s%> an <S%G2475>Israelite<s%> <S%G230>indeed,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G3756>no<s%> guile! <S%G1388><s%>

<S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, From <S%G4159>where<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> you me? <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4253>Before<s%> that <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> you, when you <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> you.

<S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4461>Rabbi,<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G3754>Because<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> to you, I <S%G1492>saw<s%> you <S%G5273>under<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> you? you shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> things than these. <S%G5130><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G737>Hereafter<s%> you shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G455>open,<s%> and the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> and <S%G2597>descending<s%> on the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>
